title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?> classSet is not returning the expected class. The output is 'MySomeClass'.
OB: When the 'onStartup' method of the 'ModuleInitializer' class is called with the 'classSet' parameter containing a class annotated with '@MySomeAnn', the output is 'MySomeAnn'.
EB: When the 'onStartup' method of the 'ModuleInitializer' class is called with the 'classSet' parameter containing a class annotated with '@MySomeAnn', the expected output should be 'MySomeClass'.
